item.title: Apple CEO Tim Cook addresses iPhone 14 Pro supply shortage
item.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook addresses iPhone 14 Pro supply shortage Apple talks about iPhone 14 Pro shortage issue; CEO Tim Cook claims stock shortage should end soon.

item.title: Sundar Pichai received an early warning of an earthquake hitting San Jose
item.description: Sundar Pichai received an early warning of an earthquake hitting San Jose You receive alerts about heart rate, blood pressure and even car accident on your smartphone.
